column4: gods-- how do i search for where something is in the file tree?  i.e. i'm trying to find apache logs-- is there some way to do 'search apache*' or something like that?
gurus!  using hardy, pidgin + message notification plugin set to use "URGENT" hint-- how do i make this actually work?  nothing is happening..
gurus!?  how do i get compiz to act on window hints?
gurus! -- how do i cp a file to multiple directors at once?  i.e. cp ../blah.txt *    where my current directory only has directories i want to copy to
